title: fps
body: my league was working fine last night but today i tried playing and i had low single digit fps and could not enjoy the game in the slightest, i was wondering if there is a way to fix this, i have already dropped the video settings to very low and switched my computer to full performance options and still only a slight increase in fps.

replies.body:
It's very likely this is caused by either a driver problem or hardware issues. As a simple step, I recommend working through the common solutions inside our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if those steps helped.
